General.question: Are there any hidden fees?
General.answer: No, we believe in transparency. All pricing is clearly displayed upfront with no hidden fees or surprise charges.

General.question: How do I get started with Beelia?
General.answer: The Beelia platform is set to launch by the end of the first quarter in 2026. We're excited about this upcoming release and encourage you to stay updated! Simply click on the 'Join Waitlist' button located in the top-right corner of our website to ensure you don't miss any important announcements.

General.question: What types of businesses can benefit from your services?
General.answer: Beelia is designed for businesses of all sizes, from startups to enterprises, across various industries. Our platform adapts to your specific needs.

General.question: What types of payment methods do you support?
General.answer: We support all major credit cards, debit cards, and digital payment methods including PayPal, Apple Pay, and Google Pay.

General.question: Is there a free trial available?
General.answer: Yes, we offer a free trial period for new users to explore our platform and discover its capabilities before committing to a subscription.

General.question: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
General.answer: Absolutely. You can cancel your subscription at any time with no cancellation fees. Your access will continue until the end of your current billing period.

General.question: Do you offer discounts for annual subscriptions?
General.answer: Yes, we offer significant discounts for annual subscriptions compared to monthly billing. Contact our sales team to learn more about our pricing options.

General.question: What happens to my data if I cancel?
General.answer: Your data remains accessible for 30 days after cancellation. You can export all your data during this period. After 30 days, data is permanently deleted in accordance with our privacy policy.

Product Features.question: What features are included in the platform?
Product Features.answer: Our platform includes AI tool discovery, one-click subscriptions, advanced search capabilities, personalized recommendations, and comprehensive safety features.

Product Features.question: Can I customize my dashboard?
Product Features.answer: Yes, our platform offers extensive customization options to tailor your dashboard to your specific workflow and preferences.

Product Features.question: Do you offer API access?
Product Features.answer: Yes, we provide API access for enterprise customers. Contact our sales team to learn more about API integration options.

Product Features.question: How often are new features added?
Product Features.answer: We continuously improve our platform with regular updates and new features. Major updates are released quarterly, with smaller enhancements throughout the year.

Product Features.question: Can I integrate Beelia with other tools I'm using?
Product Features.answer: Yes, our platform supports integrations with popular business tools and services. Check our integrations page for a full list of supported connections.

Product Features.question: Is there a mobile app available?
Product Features.answer: Yes, we offer mobile apps for both iOS and Android devices, allowing you to access your tools and manage your subscriptions on the go.

Product Features.question: How does the AI tool discovery work?
Product Features.answer: Our AI-powered discovery engine analyzes your needs and preferences to recommend the most relevant tools. It learns from your usage patterns to provide increasingly accurate suggestions over time.

Product Features.question: Can I create custom workflows?
Product Features.answer: Yes, our platform includes powerful workflow automation features that allow you to create custom processes and automate repetitive tasks across your subscribed tools.

Support.question: Are there training resources available for new users?
Support.answer: Yes, we provide comprehensive documentation, video tutorials, webinars, and dedicated support to help you get started and make the most of our platform.

Support.question: How can I contact support?
Support.answer: You can reach our support team via email, live chat, or through our support portal. We offer 24/7 support for premium customers.

Support.question: Do you offer onboarding assistance?
Support.answer: Yes, we provide personalized onboarding sessions to help you set up your account and understand all the features available to you.

Support.question: What is your response time for support requests?
Support.answer: We aim to respond to all support requests within 24 hours. Premium customers receive priority support with faster response times.

Support.question: Do you offer live chat support?
Support.answer: Yes, we provide live chat support during business hours. Premium customers have access to 24/7 live chat support for immediate assistance.

Support.question: Is there a community forum or knowledge base?
Support.answer: Yes, we maintain an extensive knowledge base with articles, tutorials, and a community forum where users can share tips, ask questions, and learn from each other.

Support.question: Can I schedule a demo or consultation?
Support.answer: Absolutely! You can schedule a personalized demo or consultation with our team to see how Beelia can best serve your specific needs. Book a session through our website.

Support.question: What languages does your support team speak?
Support.answer: Our support team is multilingual and can assist you in English, Spanish, French, German, and several other languages. We're continuously expanding our language support.

Security.question: What measures are in place to protect customer data?
Security.answer: We employ industry-standard security measures including end-to-end encryption, regular security audits, compliance with GDPR and SOC 2 standards, and continuous monitoring of our systems.

Security.question: How is my payment information secured?
Security.answer: All payment information is processed through PCI-DSS compliant payment processors. We never store your full payment details on our servers.

Security.question: Do you comply with data protection regulations?
Security.answer: Yes, we are fully compliant with GDPR, CCPA, and other major data protection regulations. Your privacy and data security are our top priorities.

Security.question: Can I export my data?
Security.answer: Yes, you can export all your data at any time. We believe in data portability and make it easy for you to access and download your information.

Security.question: How do you handle data breaches?
Security.answer: In the unlikely event of a data breach, we have a comprehensive incident response plan. We will immediately notify affected users, take steps to contain the breach, and work with security experts to prevent future incidents.

Security.question: Are my passwords stored securely?
Security.answer: We use industry-standard password hashing algorithms and never store passwords in plain text. All authentication is handled through secure, encrypted channels.

Security.question: Do you perform regular security audits?
Security.answer: Yes, we conduct regular third-party security audits and penetration testing to identify and address potential vulnerabilities. We also maintain SOC 2 Type II certification.

Security.question: What is your data retention policy?
Security.answer: We retain your data only as long as necessary to provide our services. You can request data deletion at any time, and we will comply within 30 days unless legal obligations require longer retention.
